text: @SenMcSallyAZ @realDonaldTrump @RepDLesko Back to the damn wall. The biggest threat to America is the Coronavirus and NOT Hispanics coming over a border which has been closed from letting the American people into Mexico because of our highest number of Coronavirus Deaths. So the wall is to keep Americans out of Mexico
